text:
IntroNet | Sr s/(BackEnd|FrontEnd)/ Software Engineer | Philadelphia, PA | Full-time

Remote friendly, but preference to local candidates.

We have new funding, and a completely new greenfield vision that you can still have a say in. Looking to double our size from 3 to 6! Open positions include front-end, back-end, && design.

If interested, please apply through our jobs page [ http://intro.net/jobs ] and don't forget to mention that you read this on HN.
